review: I find it very hard to maneuver through the series listing.  In addition,  when I turn it back on, instead of going to the next series that I should be watching it takes me back to several series that I have already watched.  When the internet freezes, I have to start all over again to search for the program I was watching.
author: ladypro

review: Great product!!!! All I needed was wifi, an hdmi port on the tv and a nearby outlet. And the onscreen instructions told me exactly how to connect to wifi. It really was that easy! Very portable too- perfect for travel! Very happy with this product! Great price too!
author: LegoMama

review: Got it for a gift. & Love it!
author: Aliyah

review: the wireless on this sucks, i mean really sucks, it makes it across the room but cuts out constantly.
author: blunt honesty

review: Works great! Have smart tv and fire stick works just as good.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Love the firestick. Don't love sling tv
author: Jake Corfield

review: Absolutely love this!! Now I can watch Netflix on the Tv!
author: Nicole Stelter "confused mom"

review: Bit disappointed with the Fire Stack. There is definitely a lag in the video and audio from the wireless router.The applications on Fire Stick is very limited and need continued development. It appears to be better than Chromcast but not by much.
author: Ben
